config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration CONSTRAIN_SCRIPT_ORIGIN is used to determine whether to constrain the origin of a script or not. If the configuration is set to true, the script origin will be constrained, otherwise it will not be constrained.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The configuration CONSTRAIN_SCRIPT_ORIGIN is triggered whenever the script security settings are being retrieved for a given script type, script URL, and document URL.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the CONSTRAIN_SCRIPT_ORIGIN configuration option is significant as it determines the level of security applied to scripts. If set to true, it enforces origin constraints which can enhance security but may also restrict certain functionalities. If set to false, it relaxes origin constraints which may increase flexibility but also introduce potential security risks.
